newsitem.title: USA: Allied Waste raises $525 mln in notes.
newsitem.headline: Allied Waste raises $525 mln in notes.

text.p: Allied Waste Industries Inc said on Monday its wholly owned subsidiary, Allied Waste North America Inc, priced $525 million of senior subordinated notes due December 1, 2006, with a coupon rate of 10.25 percent.
Allied Waste said it plans to use the proceeds from the offering to complete its acquisition of Laidlaw Inc's solid waste operations.
The company said the offering was increased from $475 million last week due to demand.
Goldman Sachs & Co was lead manager of the offering, the company said.
